data.title: INDIAN INDEPENDENT FILMMAKERS WORLDWIDE ASSOCIATION
data.meta_description: Check Indian Independent Filmmakers Worldwide Association registration details online. Get financial highlights, company network & industry details. Sign Up now for more reports & updates
data.text:
Directors - INDIAN INDEPENDENT FILMMAKERS WORLDWIDE ASSOCIATION

The company has 6 directors and 1 reported key management personnel.

The longest serving directors currently on board are Ankur Tewari, Deepa Roshanlal Sahi, Ketan Chandrakant Mehta, Rajan Khosa and Parvati Balagopalan who were appointed on 05 September, 2008. They have been on the board for more than 15 years. The most recently appointed director is Mukesh Rambriksh Prasad, who was appointed on 29 November, 2017.

Deepa Roshanlal Sahi has the largest number of other directorships with a seat at a total of 8 companies. In total, the company is connected to 10 other companies through its directors.

NAME DESIGNATION APPOINTMENT DATE ANKUR TEWARI Director 05 September, 2008 Other directorships - KOMMUNE ARTS PRIVATE LIMITED, DEEPA ROSHANLAL SAHI Director 05 September, 2008 Other directorships - OPEN DOOR FILMS PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYA MOVIES PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYANAGRI HIMACHAL PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYANAGRI ENTERTAINMENT PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYA DIGITAL MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYANAGRI WORLD ONE PRIVATE LIMITED, COSMOS MAYA INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, KETAN CHANDRAKANT MEHTA Director 05 September, 2008 Other directorships - OPEN DOOR FILMS PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYA MOVIES PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYANAGRI HIMACHAL PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYANAGRI ENTERTAINMENT PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYA DIGITAL MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, MAYANAGRI WORLD ONE PRIVATE LIMITED, COSMOS MAYA INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, RAJAN KHOSA Director 05 September, 2008 Other directorships - ELEPHANT EYE PRODUCTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED, PARVATI BALAGOPALAN Director 05 September, 2008 Other directorships - JABBERWOKKY MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED, MUKESH RAMBRIKSH PRASAD Director 29 November, 2017 No other directorships MUKESH RAMBRIKSH PRASAD KMP 29 November, 2017 No other directorships
